Articles.Content:
don't you think the black loading screens are boring?

and where are the tips?

i don't see any tips and i think it would be nice if we would see a picture from a rocket around the mun or a rocket launching when i'm going to launch a rocket and it's still loading everything.

that would be better than black
I think new loading screens were in the works for 1.0, but were then shoved to the back burner with a bunch of other things so they could make sure 1.0 was as polished as could be.
Is there a way to put your own pictures in the loading screen?

> 
> were shoved to the back burner with a bunch of other things so they could make sure 1.0 was as polished as could be.

So much paradox in a single sentence...
Honestly, with the new release and my SSD, loading times are so short they are practically nonexistent.

> 
> So much paradox in a single sentence...

Let me rephrase that to "as balanced and bug-free as reasonably possible in the time available before the release deadline"
Before I speak, I have something important to say...

> 
> Is there a way to put your own pictures in the loading screen?

No because the loading screens are hardcoded in the game.
Loading screens when launching and stuff are only a couple of seconds long anyway, I wouldn't have time to read the tips. A few images would be nice though.
